official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to provide technical assistance to State and local governments to encourage the incorporation of radon testing requirements in building codes.

summary.text: Radon Testing Assistance Act of 1987 - Requires the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to: (1) provide technical assistance to State and local governments to encourage the incorporation of radon testing requirements in building codes; and (2) include a description of activities carried out under this Act in the Secretary's annual report. Authorizes FY 1988 through 1990 appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to provide technical assistance to State and local governments to encourage the incorporation of radon testing requirements in building codes.
